price: 41. Que Nous te fassions disparaître (ou pas), Nous tirerons d’eux vengeance,
arabic: فَإِمَّا نَذۡهَبَنَّ بِكَ فَإِنَّا مِنۡهُم مُّنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fa-immā nadhhabanna bika fa-innā min'hum muntaqimūna
